title: Debating Identity: Atheism, Judaism, and Soul Beliefs
description: Join our discussion on the beliefs of influential thinkers like Sam Harris and Noam Chomsky. We delve into the complex intersection of atheist identities and concepts of soul within Judaism, exploring new perspectives rooted in Kabbalistic ideas. #Atheism #Judaism #Philosophy #CulturalIdentity #Kabbalah #Debate #NoamChomsky #SamHarris #ReligiousBeliefs #IntellectualDiscussion
